desc.en: 為了認真工作的老師，亞瑠在甜點咖啡廳點了芭菲。咖啡廳端出情侶芭菲時，亞瑠雖然驚慌，但內心卻開心得很。
desc.jp: 為了認真工作的老師，亞瑠在甜點咖啡廳點了芭菲。咖啡廳端出情侶芭菲時，亞瑠雖然驚慌，但內心卻開心得很。
desc.zh_cn: 为了认真工作的老师，亚瑠在甜点咖啡厅点了芭菲。咖啡厅端出情侣芭菲时，亚瑠虽然惊慌，但内心却开心得很。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

desc.en: 明日奈再次平白無故地呼叫。只是很平常地到處玩而已，不知不覺間好像又解決了一件事。
desc.jp: 明日奈再次平白無故地呼叫。只是很平常地到處玩而已，不知不覺間好像又解決了一件事。
desc.zh_cn: 明日奈再次平白无故地调用。只是很平常地到处玩而已，不知不觉间好像又解决了一件事。

desc.en: 老師在商店街發現知世追著雲跑。兩人觀察形形色色的雲好一陣子，但卻一直找不到喜歡的雲。最後兩人買了像雲朵般的棉花糖來吃。
desc.jp: 老師在商店街發現知世追著雲跑。兩人觀察形形色色的雲好一陣子，但卻一直找不到喜歡的雲。最後兩人買了像雲朵般的棉花糖來吃。
desc.zh_cn: 老师在商店街发现知世追着云跑。两人观察形形色色的云好一阵子，但却一直找不到喜欢的云。最后两人买了像云朵般的棉花糖来吃。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: 為了護衛而偷偷跟蹤[USERNAME]老師的伊樹菜。老師說這種行為會造成困擾，這番話讓伊樹菜覺得很失望。無奈之下，老師為了安撫失望的伊樹菜而邀他吃飯，結果伊樹菜馬上就復活了。
desc.jp: 為了護衛而偷偷跟蹤[USERNAME]老師的伊樹菜。老師說這種行為會造成困擾，這番話讓伊樹菜覺得很失望。無奈之下，老師為了安撫失望的伊樹菜而邀他吃飯，結果伊樹菜馬上就復活了。
desc.zh_cn: 为了护卫而偷偷跟踪[USERNAME]老师的伊树菜。老师说这种行为会造成困扰，这番话让伊树菜觉得很失望。无奈之下，老师为了安抚失望的伊树菜而邀他吃饭，结果伊树菜马上就复活了。

desc.en: 淳子找老師來一趟，並且向老師展示了自己創造的「努力成果」。那就是淳子專屬的芝町美食餐廳清單，兩個人一起去了其中一間餐廳。老師在那邊和淳子一起用餐，並且聽到了淳子對美食的價值觀。
desc.jp: 淳子找老師來一趟，並且向老師展示了自己創造的「努力成果」。那就是淳子專屬的芝町美食餐廳清單，兩個人一起去了其中一間餐廳。老師在那邊和淳子一起用餐，並且聽到了淳子對美食的價值觀。
desc.zh_cn: 淳子找老师来一趟，并且向老师展示了自己创造的「努力成果」。那就是淳子专属的芝町美食餐厅清单，两个人一起去了其中一间餐厅。老师在那边和淳子一起用餐，并且听到了淳子对美食的价值观。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 因為不滿修行部平時都被當成怪人，楓主張應該進行改變認知的活動。在和楓一起從事各種活動後，老師隱約地明白了為什麼修行部會被這樣評論。
desc.jp: 因為不滿修行部平時都被當成怪人，楓主張應該進行改變認知的活動。在和楓一起從事各種活動後，老師隱約地明白了為什麼修行部會被這樣評論。
desc.zh_cn: 因为不满修行部平时都被当成怪人，枫主张应该进行改变认知的活动。在和枫一起从事各种活动后，老师隐约地明白了为什么修行部会被这样评论。

desc.en: 從新年初就開始忙碌的老師。為了安撫身心疲憊的老師，佳世子提議一起去聽和樂器的表演。雖然老師很期待平靜的和樂器表演，但佳世子介紹的表演卻是重金屬音樂風的和樂器表演。
desc.jp: 從新年初就開始忙碌的老師。為了安撫身心疲憊的老師，佳世子提議一起去聽和樂器的表演。雖然老師很期待平靜的和樂器表演，但佳世子介紹的表演卻是重金屬音樂風的和樂器表演。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 來到市區巡邏的桐乃與老師在追捕恐怖攻擊嫌疑犯的途中，阻止了一件強盜案。而在一陣騷動以後，發現嫌疑犯所持有的可疑物品不是炸彈，而是漬物。
desc.jp: 來到市區巡邏的桐乃與老師在追捕恐怖攻擊嫌疑犯的途中，阻止了一件強盜案。而在一陣騷動以後，發現嫌疑犯所持有的可疑物品不是炸彈，而是漬物。
desc.zh_cn: 来到市区巡逻的桐乃与老师在追捕恐怖攻击嫌疑犯的途中，阻止了一件强盗案。而在一阵骚动以后，发现嫌疑犯所持有的可疑物品不是炸弹，而是渍物。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 擔任幼兒園學生觀摩導覽工作的桐乃。桐乃在示範使用手銬的方式時，因為失誤把自己銬在柱子上。桐乃因為觀摩弄得一團糟而感到自責，但是幼兒園的學生們感受到桐乃的真摯並替她加油。
desc.jp: 擔任幼兒園學生觀摩導覽工作的桐乃。桐乃在示範使用手銬的方式時，因為失誤把自己銬在柱子上。桐乃因為觀摩弄得一團糟而感到自責，但是幼兒園的學生們感受到桐乃的真摯並替她加油。
desc.zh_cn: 担任幼儿园学生观摩导览工作的桐乃。桐乃在示范使用手铐的方式时，因为失误把自己铐在柱子上。桐乃因为观摩弄得一团糟而感到自责，但是幼儿园的学生们感受到桐乃的真挚并替她加油。

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: 不小心把愛用的枕頭弄壞的椿。為了購買新枕頭來替換，椿和老師前往超市。但是椿一直找不到喜歡的枕頭，最後選擇枕在老師的大腿上。

desc.zh_cn: 不小心把爱用的枕头弄坏的椿。为了购买新枕头来替换，椿和老师前往超市。但是椿一直找不到喜欢的枕头，最后选择枕在老师的大腿上。

desc.en: 雖然月夜對自己高大的身形很自卑，不過老師卻說那樣的月夜說不定可以看見人們看不到的東西。正好當時月夜發現了成為迷路兒童的孩子，並及時幫助了他，最後領悟道自己高大的身高也不全是件壞事。
desc.jp: 雖然月夜對自己高大的身形很自卑，不過老師卻說那樣的月夜說不定可以看見人們看不到的東西。正好當時月夜發現了成為迷路兒童的孩子，並及時幫助了他，最後領悟道自己高大的身高也不全是件壞事。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然月夜对自己高大的身形很自卑，不过老师却说那样的月夜说不定可以看见人们看不到的东西。正好当时月夜发现了成为迷路儿童的孩子，并及时帮助了他，最后领悟道自己高大的身高也不全是件坏事。

desc.en: 老師偶然在街上遇到弦生。但是每當老師靠近，弦生就會不斷逃走。好不容易抓到弦生，一問之下他才回答說，自己是為了吸引老師的注意才刻意保持距離感。
desc.jp: 老師偶然在街上遇到弦生。但是每當老師靠近，弦生就會不斷逃走。好不容易抓到弦生，一問之下他才回答說，自己是為了吸引老師的注意才刻意保持距離感。

desc.en: 某天，老師為了處理私事而離開校園，沒想到街道四周卻接連響起爆炸聲，而老師也被不明人士襲擊。為了躲避敵人的襲擊，老師最終跑到高架公路上，並且和尾隨而來的若藻展開了對話。
desc.jp: 某天，老師為了處理私事而離開校園，沒想到街道四周卻接連響起爆炸聲，而老師也被不明人士襲擊。為了躲避敵人的襲擊，老師最終跑到高架公路上，並且和尾隨而來的若藻展開了對話。
desc.zh_cn: 某天，老师为了处理私事而离开校园，没想到街道四周却接连响起爆炸声，而老师也被不明人士袭击。为了躲避敌人的袭击，老师最终跑到高架公路上，并且和尾随而来的若藻展开了对话。

desc.en: 如願和老師約會的若藻，把自己事先計畫好的約會行程告訴老師，然而由於各種突發狀況，兩人的約會計畫最終徹底泡湯。相當失望的若藻在老師的安慰之下很快便重新振作起來。
desc.jp: 如願和老師約會的若藻，把自己事先計畫好的約會行程告訴老師，然而由於各種突發狀況，兩人的約會計畫最終徹底泡湯。相當失望的若藻在老師的安慰之下很快便重新振作起來。
desc.zh_cn: 如愿和老师约会的若藻，把自己事先计划好的约会行程告诉老师，然而由于各种突发状况，两人的约会计划最终彻底泡汤。相当失望的若藻在老师的安慰之下很快便重新振作起来。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.jp: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.jp: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.zh_cn: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。

desc.en: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.jp: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.jp: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与对策委员会。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。芹香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野宫跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野乃美跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。芹香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野宫跟随前往。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.jp: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.zh_cn: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。爱露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得爱露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亚瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亚瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒爱露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，爱露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.jp: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋68与雇佣兵集合，准备进攻。阿拜多斯方面也注意到了正在行进的敌人队伍，却意外发现就是在拉面店里遇到的便利屋68一行人所为。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.jp: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋68不出意外地完全失败。由于此时已经到了下班时间，丧失支援的便利屋68不得不撤退。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被阿露和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亚瑠和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被爱露和便利屋职员捡走。

desc.en: Defeating the guards, everyone is out.
desc.jp: Defeating the guards, everyone is out.
desc.zh_cn: 冲破黑市守卫的阻挡后，众人跑了出来。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野宫想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。茜香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野宫想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.jp: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到尼禄在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到宁瑠在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到妮露在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。爱丽丝突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和爱丽丝交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千禧年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉音消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长妮露康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。真理社和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。真理会和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的对策委员会。听到爱丽丝的身体没有任何异常的消息后，游戏开发部觉得很开心。另一方面，阳葵确认隐藏足迹的莉央留下的情报。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的对策委员会。听到爱丽丝的身体没有任何异常的消息后，游戏开发部觉得很开心。另一方面，阳葵确认隐藏足迹的莉音留下的情报。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的对策委员会。听到爱丽丝的身体没有任何异常的消息后，游戏开发部觉得很开心。另一方面，阳葵确认隐藏足迹的莉央留下的情报。

desc.en: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.jp: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那里驻扎着的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大东西。他们立刻联系了PMC将军和联邦学生会的防卫室。

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.jp: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.zh_cn: 白子向对策委员会众人报告了自己所看见的东西，指出这些天来PMC的军力移动相当奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜进去看一眼，但被绫音提醒了之前的事情。这时有人提议询问老师的意见；虽然害怕打扰老师，绫音还是让老师有时间就来阿拜多斯一趟。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。

desc.en: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.jp: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.zh_cn: Kei一直在暗处看着爱丽丝。Kei理解爱丽丝想要摆脱自己“王女”的身份，但指出命运最终会让她成为那样。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.jp: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 作为全千禧年最厉害的黑客，日鞠承担下了对莉央建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉央直接推卸了责任。日鞠访问了莉央存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 作为全千年最厉害的黑客，阳葵承担下了对莉音建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉音直接推卸了责任。阳葵访问了莉音存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。

desc.en: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.jp: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会一行人在列车站遇见了虚弱的白子。白子与她们发生了战斗，随后倒地。星野询问白子来自哪里，白子回答不知道。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 星野決定將落難的白子帶回阿拜多斯，並給了她一條藍色的圍巾用作保暖。
desc.jp: 星野決定將落難的白子帶回阿拜多斯，並給了她一條藍色的圍巾用作保暖。
desc.zh_cn: 星野决定将落难的白子带回阿拜多斯，并给了她一条蓝色的围巾用作保暖。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).

desc.en: 星野想起了她以前遇到白子的時候，認為此時的情況應該和當時類似。星野想不參與夏萊的集合，自己去找白子，被野乃美攔下。
desc.jp: 星野想起了她以前遇到白子的時候，認為此時的情況應該和當時類似。星野想不參與夏萊的集合，自己去找白子，被野乃美攔下。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野想起了她以前遇到白子的时候，认为此时的情况应该和当时类似。星野想不参与夏莱的集合，自己去找白子，被野宫拦下。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野想起了她以前遇到白子的时候，认为此时的情况应该和当时类似。星野想不参与夏莱的集合，自己去找白子，被野乃美拦下。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野想起了她以前遇到白子的时候，认为此时的情况应该和当时类似。星野想不参与沙勒的集合，自己去找白子，被野宫拦下。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 联邦学生会的琳由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托夏莱发布召集命令。琳随后拜托桃香和步代她处理在这期间的事情。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 联邦学生会的琳由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托夏莱发布召集命令。琳随后拜托桃香和步代她处理在这期间的事情。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 联邦学生会的琳由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托沙勒发布召集命令。琳随后拜托桃可和步代她处理在这期间的事情。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.jp: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 佳代子、优香、亚子、花子和绫音陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 佳世子、优香、亚子、花子和绫音陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 佳代子、优香、亚子、花子和绫音陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 琳再一次重複了計劃的緊迫性，指出聖塔分佈在基沃託斯六處地方，其中以DU白鳥區的能量最強，因此提議最後再來清除。就在這時陽葵接入通訊。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.zh_cn: 两周倒计时正式开启，“虚假的圣所攻略战”正式开始。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.jp: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.zh_cn: 阴阳部表示，葛业并不在百鬼夜行的学生名册上，但提到有一个地方记载了相关内容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立时，葛业设立了“百花缭乱”以调停纷争。尽管目前仍有传言百花缭乱的委员长会直接听命于她，但由于百花缭乱的正副委员长已经长时间无法联络，因而百花缭乱即将被废部――在似乎无望之际，仁耶提出了一个方法。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: Niya is a student of Yin-Yang Club.
desc.jp: Niya is a student of Yin-Yang Club.
desc.zh_cn: 仁耶是阴阳部的一名成员。

百鬼夜行文化の広報、

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 宣传百鬼夜行文化、收集百鬼夜行周边

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往沙勒社团室。

desc.zh_cn: 系统的欢迎界面，快速切换了多个剧情的内容。

desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.jp: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在招待室里，来自千禧年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及歌赫娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达沙勒；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en:
伴隨著吵雜的槍聲、華麗的爆炸聲…以及嗆鼻的火藥味！
惡名昭彰的若藻現身了！
若藻在情人節慶典會場中製造混亂的真正目的究竟為何？！
desc.jp:
伴隨著吵雜的槍聲、華麗的爆炸聲…以及嗆鼻的火藥味！
惡名昭彰的若藻現身了！
若藻在情人節慶典會場中製造混亂的真正目的究竟為何？！
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的若藻现身了！
若藻在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的若藻现身了！
若藻在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: 在不知道是第幾次成功制服若藻後，老師終於忍不住質問起吹雪和桐乃，她們兩人表示真的不會再讓這種事情發生，並且慌慌張張地將若藻再次押送回矯正局。
desc.jp: 在不知道是第幾次成功制服若藻後，老師終於忍不住質問起吹雪和桐乃，她們兩人表示真的不會再讓這種事情發生，並且慌慌張張地將若藻再次押送回矯正局。
desc.zh_cn: 在不知道是第几次成功制服若藻后，老师终于忍不住质问起吹雪和桐乃，她们两人表示真的不会再让这种事情发生，并且慌慌张张地将若藻再次押送回矫正局。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。
